channel.title: Non HD clients
channel.description: Ok I've tried everything I know to solve this problem. My Monitor will not support any client without using HD it loads and plays but flashes with a double of the screen, I also have a HD grahpics card I can post pictures of my client problem but I'm hoping I wont need to as there must be a simple way to fix this.

item.title: Non HD clients
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

Ok I’ve tried everything I know to solve this problem.
My Monitor will not support any client without using HD it loads and plays but flashes with a double of the screen, I also have a HD grahpics card
I can post pictures of my client problem but I’m hoping I wont need to as there must be a simple way to fix this.

Read full topic
